channel.title: Development, Eleventy, Ghost, DigitalOcean on Summitt Dweller's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Development, Eleventy, Ghost, DigitalOcean on Summitt Dweller's Blog

item.title: This Blog in Eleventy + Ghost
item.description: This past weekend my daughter, Mackenzie, made the decision to move her portfolio page into a configuration that features Eleventy (11ty) on the frontend with content managed in Ghost on the backend. I like that combination very much so to help support her move, and learn a little something along the way, we’ve setup a new Ghost server in a DigitalOcean droplet, namely ghostonubuntu2204-s-1vcpu-1gb-intel-nyc1-01 , and I’ve decided to make the same move myself.
